meta.title: Base64 Online Encoder Decoder | Base64 Encryption Decryption - Base64.us

main.inputLabel: Please enter the characters to be Base64 encoded or decoded:
main.inputPlaceholder: Please enter the content to be encoded or decoded...
main.outputPlaceholder: The encoding or decoding result will be displayed here...

commonOperations.title: Common Operation Settings
commonOperations.autoAddStringTooltip: Automatically add this string when encoding and remove it when decoding. Used to prevent content from being easily identified.
commonOperations.positionTooltip: Select the position to insert the string
commonOperations.encodeCountTooltip: Set the number of Base64 encoding times, multiple encoding can enhance security. Recommended 1-10 times.
commonOperations.autoCopyResultTooltip: When enabled, automatically copy the result to clipboard after encoding/decoding without manual copy button click.
commonOperations.autoDetectSwitchTooltip: When enabled, automatically detect whether the input is Base64 and perform corresponding encoding or decoding operations.

settings.title: System Settings
settings.autoAddStringTooltip: Automatically add this string when encoding and remove it when decoding. Used to prevent content from being easily identified.
settings.encodeCountTooltip: Set the number of Base64 encoding times, multiple encoding can enhance security. Recommended 1-3 times.
settings.autoCopyResultTooltip: When enabled, automatically copy the result to clipboard after encoding/decoding
settings.autoDetectSwitchTooltip: When enabled, automatically detect whether the input is Base64 and perform corresponding encoding or decoding operations

messages.decodeError: Decoding failed: Please check if the input is valid Base64 encoding.
messages.inputRequired: Please enter the content to be encoded.
messages.inputRequiredDecode: Please enter the content to be decoded.
messages.autoCopied: Result has been automatically copied to clipboard!
messages.copyFailed: Copy failed, please manually select text to copy.
messages.initialMessage: Please enter the characters to be encoded/decoded in the first text box above.
